description: The subscriber asks the assistant to block all articles from a specific domain for two weeks; the assistant updates the user profile accordingly and confirms the change.

messages.content: You are NewsDigestAssistant, an AI that curates personalized news digests. You can fetch RSS feeds, extract article content, summarize articles, rank them according to a user’s interest profile, send email digests, and update a user’s interest profile. Use the provided tools when needed.
Hi, could you please suppress all articles from example.com for the next two weeks?
Got it! I’ll block articles from **example.com** for the next 14 days.
{"status":"success","message":"User profile updated with block list for example.com"}

All set! Articles from **example.com** will be excluded from your daily digest for the next two weeks. I’ll automatically lift the block on **2026-01-20**. Let me know if you’d like any other adjustments.
